CSL_EmifPowerSavingCfg Struct Reference

Power saving configuration structure. More...

#include <csl_emif.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t modes
 
uint32_t timeoutClocksPowerDown
 
uint32_t timeoutClocksSelfRefresh
 
bool bDisableSdramClk
 

Detailed Description

Power saving configuration structure.

This structure provides configuration settings for power saving support. If default settings are desired, this structure can be ommitted in function calls and the indicated default values will be used.

Field Documentation

bool CSL_EmifPowerSavingCfg::bDisableSdramClk

[IN] If true, disables the clock to the sdram whenever a clock is not required. (default: true)

uint32_t CSL_EmifPowerSavingCfg::modes

[IN] Power saving mode(s). Multiple modes can be specified by logically OR'ing them together. For valid modes, see CSL_EmifPowerSavingMode. (default: CSL_EMIF_POWER_SAVING_MODE_POWER_DOWN | CSL_EMIF_POWER_SAVING_MODE_SELF_REFRESH)

uint32_t CSL_EmifPowerSavingCfg::timeoutClocksPowerDown

[IN] The SDRAM is automatically put into power-down after this many clocks of the EMIF command channel being idle. (default: 512)

uint32_t CSL_EmifPowerSavingCfg::timeoutClocksSelfRefresh

[IN] The SDRAM is automatically put into self-refresh after this many clocks of the EMIF command channel being idle. (default: 2048)
